Class account

java.lang.Object
account
Direct Known Subclasses:
checking, credit, savings
public abstract class account
extends java.lang.Object
Since:
February 9 2020 The account class is an abstract class containing the attributes that need to be carried across all three types of accounts that is checking, savings, and credit.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Andrew Rodriguez

      protected int accountNumber
      Attributes that carry for all different classes of type account. The attributes consist of basic information that every account should have.
